DTS:LogProvider.DTS:Description: Writes log entries for events to a SQL Server database
DTS:LogProvider.DTS:ObjectName: SSIS log provider for SQL Server

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Declara Variables. */
DECLARE @Fecha_Desde CHAR(8) = ?
DECLARE @Periodo INT = SUBSTRING(@Fecha_Desde,1,6)
/* Actualiza H_FACTURACION_DEBITOS_DIARIO. */
DELETE FROM H_FACTURACION_DEBITOS_DIARIO where id_periodo_cierre = @Periodo
INSERT INTO H_FACTURACION_DEBITOS_DIARIO (Nro_Cursograma, id_acreedor, id_tipo_prestador, id_periodo_cierre, Fecha_Cierre, id_periodo, Fecha_Recepcion, importe_Facturado, Importe_Debito_Fact, id_compania) SELECT Nro_Cursograma, id_acreedor, 'P' as id_tipo_prestador, SUBSTRING(Fecha_Cierre,1,6) as id_periodo_cierre, Fecha_Cierre, SUBSTRING(Fecha_Recepcion,1,6) as id_periodo, Fecha_Recepcion, importe_Facturado, Importe_Debito_Fact, id_compania FROM AUX_H_FACTURACION_DEBITOS_DIARIO where id_producto not in (0,18) and SUBSTRING(fecha_cierre,1,6) = @Periodo
-- Calcula lo debitado por cada Cursograma. SELECT nro_cursograma, SUM(importe_debito) as importe_debito Into #DebitosFacturacion FROM H_DEBITOS_DIARIOS a11 join D_PLANES a12 on (a11.id_plan_producto = a12.id_plan_producto and a11.id_producto = a12.id_producto) join D_PRODUCTOS a13 on (a12.id_producto = a13.id_producto) join D_CONCEPTO_DEBITO a14 on (a11.id_concepto_debito = a14.id_concepto_debito) where (a13.Id_Clase_Producto in ('S ') and a12.Id_SubRubro_Ley in (1, 2, 3, 5, 6, 7) and not ((a11.id_producto = 16 and a11.id_plan_producto = 'CC ') or (a11.id_producto=16 and a11.id_plan_producto='CM ') or (a11.id_producto=16 and a11.id_plan_producto='CS1 ') or (a11.id_producto=16 and a11.id_plan_producto='CS100') or (a11.id_producto=4 and a11.id_plan_producto='M ') or (a11.id_producto=16 and a11.id_plan_producto='M ') or (a11.id_producto=20 and a11.id_plan_producto='M ') or (a11.id_producto=14 and a11.id_plan_producto='Z ') or (a11.id_producto=20 and a11.id_plan_producto='Z ') or (a11.id_producto=1 and a11.id_plan_producto='C ') or (a11.id_producto=4 and a11.id_plan_producto='Z ')) and a13.id_segmento not in (3)) GROUP BY nro_cursograma
-- Actualiza importe en H_FACTURACION_DEBITOS_DIARIO. UPDATE H_FACTURACION_DEBITOS_DIARIO SET importe_debito_fact = D.importe_debito FROM H_FACTURACION_DEBITOS_DIARIO A JOIN #DebitosFacturacion D on A.nro_cursograma = D.nro_cursograma

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.
property.name: CommandTimeout

property.description: Specifies the name of the database object used to open a rowset.

property.description: Specifies the variable that contains the name of the database object used to open a rowset.

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

properties.property:
Select CUC_NUM as nro_cursograma, BCP_COD as codigo_barra, CUC_ACC as id_acreedor, CUC_FRE as fecha_recepcion, CUC_FCI as fecha_cierre, SUM(CUC_ITF) as importe_facturado, 0 as importe_debito_fact, (CASE when CUC_ORG = 4 then 2 else 1 end) as id_compania, SRV_COD as id_producto
from DESARROLLO.CUP004
WHERE CUC_FCI >= ? and CUC_FCI <= ? and ECA_COD not in ('A') and CUC_BJA in (' ') and CUCREI not in ('R') and CUCCAP in (' ')
GROUP BY CUC_NUM, BCP_COD, CUC_ACC, CUC_FRE, CUC_FCI, CUC_ORG, SRV_COD

property.description: The variable that contains the SQL command to be executed.
property.name: SqlCommandVariable

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.
property.name: DefaultCodePage

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: The mappings between the parameters in the SQL command and variables.
property.name: ParameterMapping

connection.description: The OLE DB runtime connection used to access the database.
connection.name: OleDbConnection

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: select CAST((dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(MAX(GETDATE() - 1))) as CHAR(6))+'01' as Fecha_Desde

DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource: select CAST((dbo.DevuelvePeriodo(MAX(GETDATE()-1))) as CHAR(6))+ CAST(DAY(GETDATE() - 1) as CHAR(2))as Fecha_Hasta
